title: maiyal koNDun
sahitya:
maiyal koNDun mahimai pidaTrum taiyalAghinEn paranE


anupallavi

  kaiyirk-kiDatta kaniyE en kaN karuttinukk-iniyAi ayya


caraNam    peNNai mayakkip-piriyam kATTip-pittum EtrinAi
kaNNaik-kaTTik-kATTil viTTa kathaiyaip-pOTrinAi
pinnu munnum minni minnip-piragu maraivadEn
pEshAi hrdaya vAsA nAn pAsham koNDa nEsA nEsA
